fulltext:
NGUYỄN TÀI TUỆ 
Mobile: (+84) 917 69 71 79 
Email:  taitue1804@gmail.com 
QUICK SUMMARY 
CAREER OBJECTIVES 
I have been practicing law since 2015.  My 
philosophy toward dealing with the matters is to 
treat the cases under the witness of the law and 
the principle of ethicality.  Along with my 
peculiarities of sharpness, quick-learn, diligence 
and meticulousness, my professionalism is keen 
on the unbiased, fair, result-oriented and highly 
effective values. 
In the next 05 years, I shall: 
• be admitted to the Bar to 
practice  law  as  an 
attorney. 
• be the General Counsel 
for any corporation that 
needs my services. 
EMPLOYMENT DETAILS 
ATOMY – Legal Counsel  
(May 2019 – now) 
• MLM Basic Training Program: Person-in-charge in running the project: writing contents; contacting the 
outsourcing units for working and corresponding issues, etc. 
• Corporate Practices: Conducting daily-basis legal consultancies, incorporating the standards for 
corporates, drafting and reviewing contracts, translating documents, contacting and working with 
outsourcing units and government authorities to handling and dealing with occasional problem-solving 
cases. 
• Corporate Compliances: Helping the legal manager to ensure the legal, procedure compliance of the 
company. 
• Translations: Translating all the documents of the firm’s clients from English to Vietnamese and vice versa. 
GLOBALINK LAW - Associate 
(May 2018 – May 2019)  
• Outbound Investment: Conducting 08 outbound investment cases for clients in Finland, Australia, United 
States and Norway.   
• Dispute Resolution & Litigations: Representing the clients in 05 cases, settling and closing 02 cases.  
• Corporate Practices: Helping the retaining clients incorporate new companies, providing legal services 
such as giving legal opinions, drafting and reviewing contracts, noticing their changes to the government 
authorities and among other things. 
• Translations: Translating all the documents of the firm’s clients from English to Vietnamese and vice versa. 
SG VISA GROUP – Legal Officer  
(Jul 2017 – Jul 2018) 
• Corporate Practices: Conducting daily-basis legal consultancies, incorporating the standards for 
corporates, drafting and reviewing contracts, translating documents, contacting and working with the 
government authorities to handling and dealing with occasional problem-solving cases. 
• Dispute Resolutions & Litigations: Helping the general counsel deal and settle the dispute with over 20 
families.  Representing the company for 03 cases in the courthouse. 
• Translations: Translating English to Vietnamese documents and vice versa. 
• Banking: Helping the General Counsel establish the international settlement for the company. 
• Agreements and Contracts: Helping to create and review all the contracts for the products of the 
corporate.  Drafting and reviewing all the agreements with internal and external partners of the corporates. 
HO CHI MINH CITY DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE – Legal Intern  
(Apr 2016 – Jun 2016) 
• 
Legal Research: helping the officers to conduct legal research to address the legal issues submitted by 
people of Ho Chi Minh City. 
EDUCATIONS  SKILLS 
JUDICIAL ACADEMY, HO CHI MINH CITY BRANCH  
(April 2018 – Now) 
Legal Practice Course 19.1B (Expected Graduation on 
August 2019) 
HO CHI MINH CITY UNIVERSITY OF LAW  
(2012 – 2016) 
Advanced Program on Civil, Commercial and International 
Practices 
• English proficiency (equivalent to IELTS band 
8.0). 
• MS Office proficiency. 
• Advanced level on English training & teaching 
(with over 06 years of practices). 
REFERENCES 
Attorney Nguyễn Thành Chung 
General Counsel of SG VISA Group 
Email: thanhchung081977@gmail.com  
Mobile: 0902 58 69 77 
Attorney Vũ Quyết Tiến 
Managing Partner of Globalink Law LLC 
Email: tienvu.globalinklaw@gmail.com 
Mobile: 0908 17 39 88 
CERTIFICATES AND AWARDS 
• Bachelor of Law – Advanced Program Course 
(Graduate with Merit). 
• IELTS 7.0 (dated September 19, 2015). 
• First prize and second prize on Law School 
Scientific Research Competitions. 
• 02 awards (champion and second runner-up 
position) in English Contests. 
• First prize (in singing) in Judicial Academy 
Cultural Contest.

educations.major_categories: Khoa học xã hội và hành vi
